snippet.title: ZPF Trailer - A Brand-New SHMUP for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive
snippet.description:
ZPF blasts onto the scene as a brand-new SHMUP for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive! Prepare for 16-bit mayhem, epic boss battles, and secrets galore. It is coming to Kickstarter on July 1st.

Follow the campaign now: https://bit.ly/ZPF-KS
More about ZPF here: https://bit.ly/MCS-ZPF
For more on Mega Cat Studios and our games, please visit: https://megacatstudios.com/
Come play & talk on Discord: https://discord.gg/megacat
